Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ActionInsertMaterialActionInsertMaterial class is the action to insert material in the scene
ActionInsertShapeActionInsertShape class is the action to insert a shape in the scene
ActionInsertTrackerActionInsertTracker class is the action to insert a tracker in the scene
CmdChangeNodeNameCmdChangeNodeName is the command that represents a node name change
CmdCopyCmdCopy class is the copy command stored in the command stack
CmdCutCmdCut class is the cut command stored in the command stack
CmdDeleteCmdDelete class is the delete command stored in the command stack
CmdDeleteTrackerCmdDeleteTracker class is the delete command for trackers nodes stored in the command stack
CmdInsertMaterialCmdInsertMaterial class is the insert command for materials stored in the command stack
CmdInsertSeparatorKitCmdInsertSeparatorKit class is the insert command for TSeparatorKit nodes stored in the command stack
CmdInsertShapeCmdInsertShape class is the insert command for shapes stored in the command stack
CmdInsertShapeKitCmdInsertShapeKit class is the insert command for tshapekit nodes stored in the command stack
CmdInsertTrackerCmdInsertTracker class is the insert command for trackers stored in the command stack
CmdLightKitModifiedCmdLightKitModified class is the light definition command stored in the command stack
CmdPasteCmdPaste class is the paste command stored in the command stack
CodeEditorCodeEditor class is the dialog to define the photon map export mode
DocumentDocument class stores the application scene
ExportDialogExportDialog class is the dialog to define the photon map export mode
GraphicViewGraphicView class implements a 3D representation of items from a model
InstanceNodeInstanceNode class represents a instance of a node in the scene
LightDialogLightDialog class is the dialog to define the light parameters
MainWindowMain window class
MapDialogMapDialog class is the dialog to select a localization
NodeNameDelegateNodeNameDelegate class to facility editing the name of a node
ParametersViewTabbed view for nodes parameters
PluginManagerPluginManager class manages plugin loading. PluginManager is used to load plugins, manage the list of loaded plugins
RandomDeviateRandomDeviate is the base class for random generators
RandomDeviateFactoryRandomDeviateFactory is the interface for random generators plugins
RayTraceDialogRayTraceDialog class is the dialog to set ray trace options
ScriptEditorDialogScriptEditorDialog class is the dialog to edit and run scripts with Tonatiuh
TLightKitKit with a transform, a light, a shape and a sunshape to represents the sun light
TPhotonMapTPhotonMap is the interface of the structures to store photons
TSeparatorKitSet of others TSeparatorKit and TShapeKit nodes with a transform and a tracker
TShapeKitTShapeKit class groups what is necessary to the shape
UpdatesManagerUpdateManager class manages Tonatiuh updates
